group_1.textLeft: Now, we're here as you've requested.

group_1.textRight: Sorry, our bad. We know you're busy preparing@for the festival.

group_1.textLeft: If we can solve the situation, sparing one day@is no issue.
Besides, the adults are more occupied with@the financing right now.

group_1.textRight: I thought you had something worked out this year?

group_1.textLeft: My dad is hesitating about this year, too...
Everyone's been working with his support in mind,@so this is a disaster...

group_1.textRight: I don't know what the deal is with the adults,@but sounds rough.

group_1.textLeft: It's not our business, so there's nothing we can do.
By the way, I don't recognize you two.
Name's Jun Kazari.
We were investigating the situation in Takarazaki@for our own reasons.
We were invited by miss Princess over there to@come help.

group_1.textRight: ...My name is...Mitsune Miwa...
I've been working with Jun to figure out@what's happening to Takarazaki...
And, we met Himena and her group...so...

group_1.textLeft: Hold on a moment, Your Highness.

group_1.textRight: What, you got some problem with how I do things?

group_1.textLeft: I wanted to assess the cooperation amongst@the three of you.
Finding a collaborator was not exactly what@I expected of you.

group_1.textRight: So then, how about you give this cutie some@extra credit for going above and beyond?

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, it's true that I hadn't set any specific rules...
All right, I'll consider this a part of your ability.
I'll permit their aid.

group_1.textRight: Thankies★

group_1.textLeft: Well then, well then, it looks like seven of us will@take out this Witch today!
But, I don't see Miyabi or Azumi...?

group_1.textRight: We're splitting up to hunt down the Witch.
Seems like the Witch's magic can only be sensed@at certain times.
That's the big problem with catching it.
Wouldn't it suck if it got away?

group_1.textLeft: I-I see, so that's your strategy!

group_1.textRight: You get it.
So, I'm gonna need the rest of you to get@on board with the plan now.
Take a look at this map first.

group_1.textLeft: Is it colored by region?

group_1.textRight: It's called a Crime Intelligence Map.
The more crime in that area, the darker the red is.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, hold on, the area around this station is@deep red...

group_1.textRight: ...You're right... And the rest is scattered@all over...?
You spotted the key point★
In fact, I want you guys to check out the@red areas today.
Shigurin and Hagurin are scoping out the@most likely spot for the Witch to appear...
But it'd suck if it happened to be somewhere else.

group_1.textLeft: .........[wait:0.8][chara:103101:motion_100][chara:103101:lipSynch_1]I see...
We'll examine the red areas surrounding the site@those two are already searching.
If there are no issues, we'll all converge upon the@site where it's most likely to be situated.
Oh, it's like we're tightening a circle around it@so the Witch can't escape!

group_1.textRight: It'll be one spot per person.@Can you guys handle it?
Lady San, what should we do?

group_1.textLeft: If this conclusion is based on the research they've@done these past few days, I'll believe it.

group_1.textRight: Then, then, me too!

group_1.textLeft: I don't mind, either. Are you okay with this,@Mitsune...?

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah.
...If we can solve this problem, it'll be a@big step forward...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it's the first step to taking pride in yourself.

group_1.textCenter: (As I thought. It appears that others will gravitate@towards the Neo-Magius under this girl's leadership.)
Alina the Magius, who raised Witches...
Embryo Eve, and the goal of beautiful ruin...
A figure who was more interested in the pursuit@of beauty than the liberation of Magical Girls...

group_1.textRight: Um, we've told you everything we know...!
Yeah, you weren't like the others...
Maybe, you were always pursuing the@ultimate beauty...

group_1.textLeft: Okay, that is sufficiente.
It doesn't sound much different from what I@heard from the Union.

group_1.textRight: Well, then...

group_1.textLeft: I'll give you one of the Witches that was inside.
It's within this cube.
I, Alina, have allowed you to acquisire one of@my masterpieces.
Be grateful.

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much...!
Thank you...!
